faq.a1: Yes, if you have non-Google Ads data (goals, offline...), you can put them in a Google Sheet and connect it to Flipika.
faq.q2: Is it as flexible as Excel?
faq.a2: Almost. You can't color each cell individually, but for marketing reporting, you gain hugely in structure and reliability.
faq.a3: Our calculated fields engine handles operations (+ - * /) and parentheses. That covers 99% of marketing needs.
faq.a4: Yes, but compare the subscription price to your hourly rate multiplied by hours saved. ROI is immediate.
faq.a5: You can export chart data to CSV if you need to do an ad-hoc analysis in Excel.
faq.a6: Flipika tables allow grouping by dimensions (Campaign, AdGroup, Keyword...), which is equivalent to a dynamic Pivot Table.
faq.a7: They say that, but they've never seen a beautiful interactive report. Try for a month, they won't want to go back.
faq.a8: Much more than an Excel file lying around in emails. Access is controlled and revocable.
